mapper.sql: ID, PartofID, OwnerID, LocationID, SupplierID, AltPartyID, AltID, AltSupplierID, Name, State, Options, Type, Webaddress, Physicaladdress, Tax, Code, Unspsc, Currency, Unit, Servicedays, Room, Bathroom, Toilet, Quantity, Person, Child, Infant, Rating, Linenchange, Refresh, DynamicPricingEnabled, Commission, Discount, OwnerDiscount, Rank, Latitude, Longitude, Altitude, SecurityDeposit, CleaningFee, AssignedtoManager, UseOnePriceRow, inquire_state, version
mapper.select: select product.ID as id from product inner join manager_to_channel on product.SupplierID = manager_to_channel.property_manager_id where manager_to_channel.channel_partner_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and product.State = "Created" and product.AssignedToManager = 1

select product.id from product where product.SupplierID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ( COALESCE(product.OwnerID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.LocationID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.SupplierID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.AltPartyID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.AltID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.AltSupplierID, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Name, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.State, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.`Type`, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.WebAddress, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Code, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Servicedays, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Currency, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Unit, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Room, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Bathroom, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Toilet, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Quantity, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Person, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Child, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Infant, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Baby, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Infant, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Rating, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Rating, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Commission, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Rank, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Latitude, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Longitude, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.Physicaladdress, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.AssignedtoManager, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.CleaningFee, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.SecurityDeposit, '') = '' or COALESCE(product.UseOnePriceRow, '') = '' )

select count(p.id) from product as p left join property_manager_cancellation_rule as pmcr on p.SupplierID = pmcr.pm_id where p.State = 'Created' and p.AssignedtoManager = 1 and (pmcr.cancellation_date is null or pmcr.cancellation_refund is null or pmcr.cancellation_transaction_fee is null);
